feature: Add PredictionVector Repository for prediction tracking
description: Create PredictionVector schema and repository to manage agent prediction vectors with analytics capabilities for measuring prediction accuracy over time.

phases.name: Schema Definition
phases.description: Create PredictionVector schema with tracking fields

subtasks.title: Add predictionVectorStatusEnum to schema
subtasks.description: Create pgEnum for prediction vector statuses: pending (awaiting check), checked (verified by system), resolved (outcome determined).
subtasks.notes: predictionVectorStatusEnum already exists in packages/db/src/schema/prediction-market.ts with all three required statuses: pending, checked, resolved. No changes needed.

subtasks.title: Create predictionVector table schema
subtasks.description: Add predictionVector table to prediction-market.ts schema with fields: id, agentId, marketId, prediction (yes/no using existing marketPositionSideEnum), status, confidence (0-1 numeric), accuracy (null until resolved), checkCount, reasoning, predictedAt, checkedAt, resolvedAt, createdAt, updatedAt. Include appropriate indexes for agentId, marketId, status, predictedAt.
subtasks.notes: Successfully added predictionVector table to packages/db/src/schema/prediction-market.ts with all required fields: id, agentId, marketId, prediction (using marketPositionSideEnum), status (using predictionVectorStatusEnum), confidence (0-1 numeric), accuracy (nullable), checkCount (integer), reasoning, predictedAt, checkedAt, resolvedAt, createdAt, updatedAt. Included indexes for agentId, marketId, status, and predictedAt as specified.

subtasks.title: Add predictionVector relations
subtasks.description: Create relations linking predictionVector to agent and predictionMarket tables. Update existing agent and predictionMarket relations to include vectors.
subtasks.notes: Successfully created predictionVectorRelations linking to agent and predictionMarket. Updated both predictionMarketRelations and agentRelations to include vectors many relation. Added required import of predictionVector in agent.ts schema. All relations follow the existing Drizzle ORM patterns in the codebase.

phases.name: Repository Implementation
phases.description: Implement PredictionVectorRepository with CRUD and analytics methods

subtasks.title: Create prediction-vector.repository.ts base structure
subtasks.description: Create new repository file extending BaseRepository with type exports: PredictionVector, PredictionVectorStatus, PredictionVectorFilters interface. Follow patterns from agent.repository.ts.
subtasks.notes: Successfully created prediction-vector.repository.ts extending BaseRepository. Added type exports: PredictionVector (using InferSelectModel), PredictionVectorStatus (string union type), and PredictionVectorFilters interface extending PaginationParams with filters for agentId, marketId, status, confidence ranges, and date ranges. Follows exact patterns from agent.repository.ts.

subtasks.title: Implement basic CRUD methods
subtasks.description: Add methods: findById, findByAgent(agentId), findByMarket(marketId), create(data), update(id, data), delete(id).
subtasks.notes: Successfully implemented all basic CRUD methods in prediction-vector.repository.ts: findById, findByAgent, findByMarket, create, update, and delete. All methods follow the exact patterns from agent.repository.ts. Added CreatePredictionVectorData interface for type-safe creation. Methods include proper type annotations, use drizzle-orm queries with eq/desc operators, and return appropriate types (null for not found, arrays for multi-result queries).

subtasks.title: Implement findAll with filters and pagination
subtasks.description: Add findAll method with PredictionVectorFilters: agentId, marketId, status, confidenceMin, confidenceMax, predictedAfter, predictedBefore. Include PaginatedResult support using BaseRepository.paginate pattern.
subtasks.notes: Successfully implemented findAll method with all requested filters: agentId, marketId, status, confidenceMin, confidenceMax, predictedAfter, predictedBefore. Added PaginatedResult support using BaseRepository.paginate pattern. Method follows exact patterns from agent.repository.ts and prediction-market.repository.ts with SQL[] array for dynamic conditions, gte/lte operators for range queries, and parallel execution of data/count queries. Returns proper PaginatedResult with data, total, limit, offset, hasMore fields.

subtasks.title: Implement status lifecycle methods
subtasks.description: Add methods: markAsChecked(id) - increments checkCount and sets checkedAt timestamp; resolve(id, outcome: boolean) - calculates accuracy based on prediction vs outcome, sets resolvedAt and status='resolved'.

subtasks.title: Implement accuracy analytics methods
subtasks.description: Add analytics methods: getAgentAccuracy(agentId) - returns avg accuracy for resolved predictions; getAccuracyByConfidenceRange(agentId?) - buckets predictions by confidence (0-0.5, 0.5-0.7, 0.7-0.9, 0.9-1.0) with accuracy for each; getAgentStats(agentId) - returns {totalPredictions, resolvedPredictions, avgAccuracy, avgConfidence, calibrationScore}.

subtasks.title: Export repository from index.ts
subtasks.description: Add predictionVectorRepository instance export and all type exports (PredictionVector, PredictionVectorStatus, PredictionVectorFilters, AgentPredictionStats) to packages/db/src/repositories/index.ts.

phases.name: Verification
phases.description: Verify implementation with type checking and linting

subtasks.title: Run TypeScript type check
subtasks.description: Execute 'bun check-types' to verify all types are correctly defined and no TypeScript errors exist.

subtasks.title: Run Biome linter and formatter
subtasks.description: Execute 'bun check' to ensure code follows project style guidelines.

final_acceptance: PredictionVector schema exists with all required fields and indexes
Analytics methods return proper accuracy metrics
